channel.title: Screenshot help part 2
channel.description:
Unlike the other thread, I'm trying to take a screenshot from the original Half Life. I play it via Steam, but it's the original HL, not HL: Source.
I hit F5 (which is what it is bound to, and I've also tried F4) in-game, and then look at the steamapps -> magical master -> half life. Originally there was no screenshots folder. After I couldn't find any screenshots, I tried making a folder called "Screenshots" and attempted to take the screenshots again, with no luck.
I don't know if I'm even taking the screenshots in the first place, so...can anyone shed some light on this subject?
Edit: Finally found it. steamapps -> user name -> half life -> valve folder.
